snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 3 - The Secret of Her Powers [Extra Episode] [DLC]
snippet.description:
Valkyria Chronicles 3
Riela's Story:
The Secret of Her Powers
September 1935
Mission: "The Things I Protect with this Power"
Objective: Occupy enemy camp
Difficulty: ---
Weapon received: Gunn (sword)

This DLC narrates the story of Riela's memento and how it has helped her during her battles.
